Not ALL rulers were of this kind. 陳廣忠: 有头戴兜婺翻卷领部而统冶天下的 gets this right, the Westerners seem to get it wrong, and the free Russian version gets nowhere.]

Interestingly, 許匡一 misconstrues the Chinese as well: ，避开有害的，靠近有利的。 陳廣忠 fares no better: 去进免遇到的祸害，而靠近对他们有利的事情己。 Nor does 劉康德：去避开有害的东西， 趋于有益的东西。 One begins to wonder whether we, as grammarians, have always completely misunderstood the function of 所 as an object-pronoun that does make the verb which it precedes transitive. However, the reading that grammar yields is manifestly more philosophically relevant than the translators' meaning which does not try to address the grammar of the Chinese. It does look as if grammarians have it right.]
